attributes.action: Withdraw MEP Nigel Farage's mandate (as of Art.13(3), Act of 20 September 1976).
attributes.additional_details: MEP Farage jeopardises international relations by negotiating directly with a foreign leader without the consent of the EU Parliament or the UK Government. He does not represent the interests of his constituency in Britain.
attributes.background: MEP Nigel Farage has cost British and European taxpayers millions of Euros in salary and future pension benefits. He shamefully neglects his duties as MEP and works on disintegrating the European Union. He jeopardises international relations. He should be recalled.
